endorses Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Dick Cheney of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's`` ability to inspire'' and the`` inclusive nature of his campaign.'' Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said,`` The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
